statements: SELECT id, location FROM gis_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, id FROM gis_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM gis_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT ST_AsGeoJSON(location) AS location_geojson, id FROM gis_data WHERE id = 4;
SELECT * FROM gis_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, location FROM gis_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM gis_data WHERE ST_Distance(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(0 0)', 4326)) < 1000;
SELECT id, location FROM gis_data WHERE ST_IsEmpty(location) = FALSE ORDER BY id LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location FROM gis_data WHERE ST_Within(location, ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 0 5, 5 5, 5 0, 0 0))', 4326));
SELECT id, location FROM gis_data WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, location, data FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
SELECT location, data FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_X(location) > 0;
SELECT id, location, data FROM spatial_data WHERE data->>'category' = 'fruit';
SELECT id, location, data FROM spatial_data ORDER BY ST_Y(location);
SELECT id, location, data FROM spatial_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE id = 'a61950d3-fb64-4b08-8cb6-3aeacbd8d60a'
SELECT id, location FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_X(location) > 0 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_Y(location) < 0
SELECT id, data FROM spatial_data WHERE data ->> 'value' = 'high'
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location='New York'
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE username='John Doe'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations
SELECT * FROM data_entries WHERE entry_date>'2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, entry_date FROM data_entries WHERE entry_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY entry_date ASC;
SELECT username, entry_data FROM users u INNER JOIN data_entries de ON u.user_id = de.user_id WHERE entry_data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT u.username, l.location_name FROM users u JOIN locations l ON u.location = l.location_name WHERE u.user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM data_entries WHERE entry_date = '2021-06-15');
SELECT id, location, data_type, value FROM gis_data;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT layer_name, visibility FROM layers WHERE visibility = TRUE;
SELECT map_name, creation_date FROM maps ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM gis_data JOIN layers ON gis_data.id = layers.layer_id;
SELECT * FROM gis_data WHERE data_type='temperature' AND value > 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'jo%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT map_id, map_name, creation_date FROM maps WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM layers WHERE visibility = TRUE ORDER BY layer_id;
SELECT id, location, data_type, value FROM gis_data WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT label, description FROM markers WHERE marker_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 1000
SELECT * FROM markers WHERE label LIKE '%important%'
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT visual_name, visual_type FROM visuals ORDER BY visual_id ASC
